mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Van Winkle, Peter G. to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Van Winkle, Peter G.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Pierpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Oct 18 1861. By Telegraph from Parkersburg 18 1861. A messenger just in from Hill he has got back to Elizabeth only two men wounded the rebels have withdrawn or dispersed . I think the troops here or a portion of them should go at once to the oil wells and remain there a while. P.G. Van Winkle 45W145Col
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Van Winkle, Peter G.
Parkersburg, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
